content.detailedDescription: I was driving eastbound on the long island expressway and was looking at fireworks to the north. i noticed 10 to 15 bright amber/orange orbs of light. the lights were perfectly round in shape. i immeidiately thought wow those are cool fireworks.. then i pulled off to the side of the highway and just kept watching them ,i managed to get three pictures with a proffesional canon 20d dslr   using my 300mm lens , :note, i actually had time to reach into the back seat grab my camera select wich lens i should use attach the lens select my camera setting's, and the subjects were still hovering?? at the time of the photo's the objects started dispersing and slowly dissapearing one by one.. i have never seen anything like this in my life and i was trying to make sense of it for days and days?? what kind of objects stay in the sky like that are just hovering ? and mostly why did they move in different directions? i was thinking maybe flares? but  the wind would have made all of the fireballs move at the same rate in the same direction.. at first all of the orbs were in a group spread out over what seemed to be a mile or so then they all just drifted in different directions at all different speeds ,some moved away fast ,while others hovered , then three past me traveling east and just vanished? ? i am freaked out , i am an avid astronomer and see moving things in the sky all the time, i have quite large telescopes and always come to a solution that is in the end is"man made" this was way beyond just a light in the sky ,it was close to me, two planes flew over it right as it happened "1" 747, and "1" small cesna-172, theese objects were not anywhere near flight altitude ,i fly with my brother on occasion he is a lisenced pilot, i also noticed that others on long island saw the same thing on the same day ,"at the same time"!!! please email me if you also saw this or if you want more information and pictures.. ---> [email address removed]
content.summary: Orange spheres "10-15" hovering in place for five minutes then moving east and disappearing behind trees.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the airport for 4th of july firework when we saw strange orange lights on the eastern horizon we watched it for about 5 to 10min fly over the tree line then stop flash red three times before fading away in front of our eyes.
then 15 to 20 min later we saw it again this time it was on the southern sky flying towards us at a slow rate of speed it was about the size of a military fighter it had no faa lights it flew over us about 500 to 1000 feet with no sound it had a orange pulsating light on the bottom of it that covered the entire bottom of it when it pulsated you could just make out a teardrop shape to it.
then it did a 90deg turn towards the eastern horizon stopped pulsed red three or four time and faded away.
then during the fireworks it reappeared in the western sky and this time it hovered in one place during the entire fireworks show which is 25 to 30min long then it pulsed red three to four times and faded away
content.summary: Multiple orange/red pulsating lights seen over battle creek during fireworks july 4, 2010.

content.detailedDescription:
i live in the south east part of wichita just east of mc connell afb. here it is legal to enjoy fireworks from the 29th of june to the 5th of july. my yorkie was so frighten that she was hiding, so i thought that the best thing to do was to take her for a ride and show her what it was all about.  she love's christmas lights.  once she understood that the loud noise was related to the pretty colors she calmed down and we actually had a nice ride along the east side of wichita at about 9:45 - 10:30 pm on the evening of the fourth of july, 2010.
     we turned around at our local super market and headed south of harry st on webb road on the south east side of wichita.  up in the sky i noticed an bright orange object heading towards us from a east by south east direction at approximately 300 feet high.  i thought it looked like a small balloon at first until it came closer. then in the middle of the circle there was what appeared to be a flame or a yellowish part with a darker part below in the shape of a vertical cylinder.  i thought at that time that it was a small hot air balloon of some sort probably set up by some pranksters in our local area.  this has happened here before and is very dangerous to our farmers fields. it keep coming in a straight line with out variance left or right or ascent or decent.  this didn���t make sense because if this orange glowing orb was being pushed by the evening wind currents then there certainly would have been some sort of noticeable drift. there wasn't.
     about 20 mins earlier my dog and i were watching a neighbor family set off their fire works in front of their home in the street as it is our custom here.  they set off several "shower of spark's". we were parked down wind of them and had to move the car because the thick smoke was blowing into the car making it uncomfortable. the smoke came in gust's as it moved through the air and in a direct north direction. this is how i know for sure about the wind that night.  besides if you live in kansas, knowing about the wind is second nature. 
     as it floated over head i saw what i thought was a darker cylinder in the object was more like a flat bottom.  this thing what ever it was had dimension. there was a top and a  bottom and a round body that was glowing orange with a slightly yellowish center.  it had a set course and a set attitude. the yellow in the center did vary in intensity. at times it was more yellow and less yellow but not anything like a hot air balloon using its tanks to maintain a constant flight plan. 
	it continued in a west by north west direction and it became harder and harder to see due to distance . the whole sighting lasted about 1 to 2 mins. i have lived around air force base's for thirty years and i have never seen any thing like this. 
     could this be a prank? possibly. but i would like to see somebody duplicate every thing that this u. f. o. accomplished in such a short period of time.  to duplicate this flight i would estimate would cost thousands of dollars in research and development and then thousands more to implement. could some body get lucky and set a luminous, lighter than air platform into the sky and accomplish what this u. f. o. did?  silent flight, a perfect flight path, constant altitude, no pitch or yaw flying against a wind current, an unknown propulsion system, an unknown energy source.  yea, i guess they could but i would like to reserve a crap table in vegas with these guys for just a few short hours.
	one other thing,  i guess a lot of other people saw these things in other parts of the country on july 4th, 2010.

truthfully,
*(wit's initials deleted--sgonzalez/cms) in wichita
content.summary: Orange, round, sphere shaped, it moved in a straight path west to n. w.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my porch looking at the sky when i noticed a bright whit light that overpowered all the other stars in the sky.  it was about the size of pencil lead and pure white.  i watched it for it held steady for several munites  an then it started to move to the right in a "nike shoosh".  the light turned from brillant white to red during the movement.It vanished when it got dark red.  from my position it was 215 degrees north magenitic 3 fingers above the horizon and the total light path was about 4 fingers long.  i used a compass and my finger measurements were at arms lenght.
content.summary: Bright white light.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on a balcony with freinds...Watching the fireworks that were going on around us...We were out in the country...And we could see in all directions ....When i had noted a orange light coming from the south over the ohio river heading north in a straight line...I  took it to be a helicoptor...Saying that it was probably the news channel taking arial pictures of the fireworks....It went over head past the house...
about 5 minutes later my husband said..Hey there is that orange light again how did it get back where it started so soon?   again we watched the orange light from the south heading north in a straight line coming overhead  us...Our attention was fully on this orange light...As it got closer it was certain that it was shaped as a huge ball and the color remained a bright orange.....It was very high...There was no noise...And as it started to go over the house...It started to fade out..I stared at it as if not to miss anything...And could definately see that it was the shape of a ball....My husband ran to the front of the house to keep his eye on it...But the object dissappeared by the time he ran to the front yard..Which reaally disappointed us...
little ed our freinds 10 year old son...Asked me what was that orange ball?  i told him ..You just saw something quite remarkable...An unindentified flying object..I was amazed the rest of the eveing,,,and still am.
content.summary: Orange ball in sky making no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dogs out to do their business at about 11:15 to 11:20 p.M.  i noticed some locals shooting off fireworks in the neighborhood north of me.  i am on the southwest side of kokomo and was looking due north.  this is when i noticed the 4 or 5 orange balls of light hanging in a somewhat vertical formation in the northern sky, at about a 45 degree angle from the horizon.  i also noticed several other slightly smaller obols just west of these, swirling out in such a way that the whole formation reminded me of the big dipper.  i fully expected the obols to drift down and dissipate as i assumed they were part of one of the fireworks.  it didn't take long for me to realize these were no fireworks.  the lights were more orange than red, perfectly round and continued to hang in the same position for at least the 15 minutes that i was outside with the dogs.  it slowly dawned on me that these things looked exactly like, and probably were, the same things i had witnessed on several occasions back in march and april of 2008.  same color, same shape.  except the ones in 2008 didn't last nearly this long.  i finally took the dogs back into the house and stopped looking at them.  i remember thinking, "they must have come back to watch the fireworks."   
these were not fireworks and definately not sky lanterns.  they were much larger than even the brightest planet visible at this time of the year.  possibly 4 times the brightness of venus.
content.summary: 4 or 5 obols form a vertical line while 4 others swirl out to the west.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my girlfriends house after watching fireworks when she pointed out an orange/red orb that was soaring across the sky at a pretty good speed and then another one followed it and it kept flying into the distant.  it was probably 2 or 3 times the size of a star and i watched it for about 5 minutes.  if i was to compare it to something it would be a meteor falling, but it was obviously not a meteor because it was going side ways and looked to be about the same height that an airplane would be if not lower.  i didnt really put too much thought into and went inside, but when my girlfriends parents went out to look at it, it was already gone.  the only reason i thought it was something was because my girlfriend told me a couple days later that their had been other reports about the same type of objects.
content.summary: 2 orange/red orb objects flying through the air.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east toward iron river, michigan when a friend and i saw a glowing red/orange ball of light in the sky. i looked up because fireworks were going off around the night sky, but this light stayed glowing for about 10 min. i thought it was another firework, but it looked like it was moving a bit and the light was consistent. it flickered a little bit before it disappeared. i though after seeing this that there was nothing i know of it could be, so thus a ufos. the light just disappeared above the horizon.
content.summary: Red/ orange glowing light.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfreind were traveling south on highway 87 towards yankee stadium in the bronx,ny and right above our vehicle approaching from the right side of the car were two very big and bright white lights. after noticing the lights moving slowly towards us i looked up saw that the craft was triangular in shape and either black or dark grey. when the craft passed over our car i can see that from the back there was 3 white lights in a row and they were steady. there was no other color lights on this craft and none of the lights blinked. when i first saw the lights i thought maybe it was a large airplane flying slow and low but the two lights in front were spaced apart way too far! and living in westchester county ny and not far from westhester county airport i no what airplanes look like!! furthermore, the craft made no noise from what i can tell. i had my window down very excited and my head hanging out and looking up. we lost sight of the object because we were driving on the highway going south and the object was headed north above us! as a young man i witnessed first hand the westchester "boomerang" spotted throughout the hudson valley and i have also seen a triangular craft before at close sight in the summer of 1991.
content.summary: Large silent triangular craft one exit from yankee stadium.

content.detailedDescription:
I was making a furniture delivery for my work around 3 p.M. on friday, the 28th of may, 2010.  i was in the delivery truck as the passenger, heading south on i-15 to the town of new harmony, utah. about 12 to 14 miles south of cedar city i was glancing around towards the mountains to my left hand side, and a good distance above the mountain tops i noticed what first appeared to be a small plane. it was hard to get a good look at the shape and size because it was a metallic color and there wasn���t a cloud in the sky to block the sun, which caused a glare off of the object. i watched it for some time without saying anything to the driver, thinking it was just an ordinary plane. over the course of time i watched it, it didn���t seem to make much movement or gain any distance towards or away from us, aside from a few very small side to side type motions. something about it made me keep staring for a while but i still never said anything to the driver of the vehicle.  i noticed out of the corner of my eye that we were coming up on some traffic, so i looked a head for no more than 3 seconds, then turned back to look at the object again but it was completely gone. where the object was in relation to its surroundings, there was nowhere it could have gone to escape my line of sight within just a few seconds.  it wasn���t until then that i felt alarmed enough to say anything to my co-worker, who didn���t think much of the situation. 
about 30 to 45 minutes after the sighting we were headed back north to cedar city and spotted a number of dark and unmarked vehicles wit us government license plates, as well as a fairly low flying military plane with some large attatchment on the bottom of the plane that looked like some type of radar or satelite device.
content.summary: Strange flying object over nearby mountains, it didn't appear to be moving. looked back a second later and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend sonny were out side one night smokeing a ciggerette. it was about 10ish. clear night sky. we were looking up at the stars naming the big dipper and what not. and that was when this one paticular star-like thing that caught my attention. it would move to one side of the sky and then bam! it was on the other side. it just moved so fast. me and sonny were trying think of what it was. fisrt we thought it was a plane or jet. but those dont move in zig zags going super freakian fast. thats when we decided that it defintly was a a ufo. i called my family and told them to look up too. they all saw it. and they all aggree.
content.summary: I saw a bright star moving back and forth through the night sky at a ridiculosly fast pace.  way too fast for any object we have on earth. i just know it was a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out on my porch checking on my cats, i walked to the edge of my sidewalk (west side of my house), i turned and faced north when i saw a very bright star like object coming my way slowely.  upon first sight i thought it was a very bright planet, but then realized it was moving. as it came closer, the brightness dimmed to almost an amber color and it seemed to be wabble...I thought to myself, uhoh...Here we go again, for i have been observing unusual things in the sky for a couple of years now. there were no blinking lights,  i listened closely for any sound it would make, but there was none. by the time the object passed overhead, it had dimmed down to the tiniest dimmest light, but still visible, it had also come to a stop. then all of sudden,  a bright blink of light appeared where the dim light had been, first one blink...White in color, then a red blink right beside it, then what appeared to be a white blink in front of the object and another behind it...Making it look like an elongated object, then it started to move to the southeast at a faster steadier pace.  about 3 minutes later, a military helicopter flew over going the same direction.  i just want to add that nearly everynight since april, the ufo sightings have been picking up around here...Just like last year.  i have made a number of reports, i havent been able to pick any of this up on film or camera, but i have been feeling very compelled to draw these things i have seen.  i have also been having strange dreams.  about a month ago, my boyfriend and i were being followed by several strange crafts while we were out taking a moonlit drive, no drugs or alcohol were involved.  there was some time lost.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star like object moving from north to south changing color and shape.

content.detailedDescription:
He have much speed i thing around 1500 km/h, don,t'have a noise.
the object fly very fast and wis no noise.
i thing that is a discovery decolagem.
content.summary: I see one triangle wis reds fire in eache vertices and one fire more in the center, cross over my house at 1500 meters hi, and wis 1000 km/h in the direcion from nort to sul.

content.detailedDescription:
For the second year in a row, we ( about 15 of us) were enjoying fireworks on july 4th 2010 near midway airport in chicago and witnessed an orange flare flying object. last year we saw the same thing but i think like many poeople, we were in denial. i jokingly told the group that maybe we would see it again.  sure enough.. at around 9:07pm, we saw the same thing. organ flare flying object which we know for a fact was not a plane, especially since there was no sound. although already dark, there was a tad bit of light in the sky and once the object passed right above us to the point where we did not see the orange light, we clearly saw the grey, circular object pass us by.  we couldn't believe that we saw this again. we took footage on an iphone and the orange colored objects looks just like all of the other sightings and footage shown. there are alot on sightings on this night ( look up on youtube). the strangest thing is that they are all around the same time ( between 9pm and 10pm).  anyway, after all of us agreed that what we saw was a ufo, about 20 minutes later we saw 
another one, this one being a little further than the one that passed right above us the first time. 

what is going on? many people across the world witnessed the same thing. 
how can the authorities miss this ??
why on 4th of july?  
some of the footage i see on youtube had as many as 10 at a time?
are they planning on invading our planet?
content.summary: Saw orange glowing object twice...Once at around 9:07, the other about 20 min later.

content.detailedDescription: My friend took this picture sometime in the early evening near the hudson river in nyc. we had gone for a bike ride to lower manhaten to shoot pictures by the highline. we didnt notice anything until we looked at the picture in the camera. at first i thought it could be dirt on the lens. then my friend zoomed in and the object was purple when blown up on the screen. im not sure what it could be so i thought why not submit it...
content.summary: Didn't see anything with the naked eye. only noticed it after we shot a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was approximately 1/8 to 1/4 of a mile from route 31 just west of medina, ny in an alliance church parking lot. time was approximately 7:00pm. i noticed a white light going on and off approximately twice the height of the telephone poles following route 31 west. it appeared to be a helicopter at first, but as it got closer i noticed that the light was not flaring out like a search light - it appeared more like a laser. every time a car would approache where it was, the light would go out. 

i continuted to watch it as it cam right across from me, and there was a small red light that appeared to go in a circle underneath it. at the times that the white light was on, i could see part of the bottom of the craft and it looked like a dark metal with geometric patterns. i could hear the cars on route 31, but i could not hear the craft.

i recently retired from a state government job and am a professional with two graduate degrees. i am also a vietnam era usaf veteran and have been on both sac and mac bases. what bothered me about this craft was that i could not identify a propolsion system. i didn't hear anything at all. it's edges were a bit...Hazy ...Almost like watching the air over something hot. it also appeared to shift a bit from side to side, but the light remained stable. hard to describe. i never did see the complete shape as it was dark out and the craft would probably not even be seen if it weren't for the red circling light and the white laser type light. my guess is that it would have been approx. the size of a bus and was moving at approx 15 20 mph.  

i've been around large balloons and they still make noises from heating the air inside the balloon. this craft made no noise at all, and just followed the road. 

i waited until i retired to post anything on my experience. if anyone knows what this thing was, feel free to contact me. i thought it might have been a stealth military craft, but i knew people in the air force at the time this happened and they told me that none of the craft that they knew of was completely silent.
content.summary: Object was dark and following route 31 from medina toward middleport, ny.

content.detailedDescription: It was a saturday afternoon, i was in the garden preparing some metalwork for spray-painting. i happened to look up at the clouds to gauge if there was a chance of rain and i caught a glimpse of something flying high up in the clouds, moving in and out of the clouds. i can't seem to use binoculars properly so i thought i'd use my digital camera on full zoom to see if i could see anything. we get a lot of peregrine falcons around this area so to me it was a perfect chance to catch one in flight as i already have a few pictures of one in my garden feeding. anyway, with the camera on full optical zoom which is only 3x on a kodak md41, i only just managed to see something on the lcd screen, the sky was bright so my eyes were nearly closed and streaming because of the light, i clicked the button and took the picture. i let my eyes recover for a minute and then went inside to view the picture, which is when i noticed that what i had captured appeared to a mettalic disc. i was very excited. i quickly went back outside but there was nothing visable in the sky. after that i was in no state to complete my project for the day. i have never seen anything like this before or after that day.
content.summary: Mettalic disc in the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: July 4, 2010 9:00pm at rockaway beach, missouri there were hundreds of people in the park looking up at the sky in preparation to watch fireworks.  it was a somewhat chilly night for july.  we were in the grass next to the lake and a playground.  7 of us in my family saw a bright orange fireball moving across the sky from the south to the north about 3-5000 feet above the ground.  there was a lighter foggy border around it but all you could really see was fire underneath the object, which was unseen due to the dark night sky.  it was about the size of mars when it's closest to the earth.  the object was seen for about 10-12 minutes and then went behind a cluster of trees and wasn't seen again.  we discussed a hot air balloon, an airplane and a blimp as answers, but none of them seemed to be the right fit for a description of the object we saw.
content.summary: An orange fireball slowly moved across the night sky and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Snapshots of ufo from video taken at fort travis texas
content.summary: Daylight ufo - snapshots taken from video.

content.detailedDescription:
I took photographs of mt. hood in several locations on my way to the base of mt. hood. i used one of the photographs as my desktop photo and noticed an object in the distance. i didn't notice these objects in my photographs until 2 weeks later. i looked closer and there are 4 consecutive photographs that have object(s) (dsc07897 - dsc07900). the first 3 photographs have one object, the last photograph has 2 objects. the photographs are 5, 11, 16 seconds apart.


note: response to the 6 points:
1.) i was with a colleague taking photographs of mt. hood. we stopped at several scenic points while we were traveling to the base of mt. hood.
2.) i didn't notice the objects at the time i took the photographs. not until i used a photograph as my desktop did i notice an object.
3.) i thought it was a plane or a helicopter or a bird.
4.) looking at the photographs with only a few seconds between the photographs, it traveled distances quickly.
5.) at first i felt intrigued. as i looked at the photographs closer i became a little more excited.
6.) question doesn't apply.

my exact location is not known by me since this was my first time in portland. with land markers in the photographs one could determine my excat location.
content.summary: Photographs taken show ufos.

content.detailedDescription: Everything started from chicago,i was working in down town in an indian restuarant called clay oven.In my break time i use to go to coffee shop next to the resturant.I use to drink green tea 3 times a day and even my own urine.By which i got spiritual power.I could communicate with light by my eyes.Then i moved to kansas city.I had received full natural power.From there i wsa moving to chicago.In the way got attracted to stars in the sky which were actually aliens in the sky.I called them on earth but i couldn't meet them they landed far from.I tried to communicate again but they left smoke in the sky and left away.I was in the hospital st louis missouri for 15 days.But i did not tell the doctor's about my spiritual power.Then they sent me to the immigration department.My power lasted for 1 month only.
content.summary: Aliens people from other planet.

content.detailedDescription: I was eating a mcdonalds and noticed everyone pointing west and i saw these 6 lights moving across the sky - low and silent, in formation until one varied the others.  i have it on my camera phone - but, in the moment it is filmed upside down and when i got out of the car i just left the phone and didn't think of it.  everyone outside was quiet and watching mostly.  i was amazed, i have never seen anything like this. i never saw anything on tv or news about it.  i was astonished and the people had gathered to watch it. we are not far from cape canaveral.  it was viewable for about 7 minutes, it was silent and moved slowly.
content.summary: 6 bright lights in formation silently and slowly passed over melbourne, fl.

content.detailedDescription: Triangle formation of very bright stars (one orange, two white).
content.summary: Triangle formation of stars (one orange, two white).

content.detailedDescription: My husband who is a conservative skeptic and thinks ufo's are silly, was out in our pool last night and noticed a triangle of lights. he thought " iwonder what constellation that is?" it was very hot and hazy so he was surprised to see stars so bright....That is what caught his attention...He looked at it and then it just faded away. it was in the southern sky and it did not move. he was very perplexed and came in and told me about it....I said, maybe a cloud covered it? he said no, there werent any clouds. it disapearred all at once, not gradually.
content.summary: Triangle of 3 lights.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 4:20a.M,not being able to sleep and bored with facebook i stepped out onto my deck to potty my beagle,bob and to smoke a cigarette and check the weather. i found a clear and star-lit sky, not at all hazy considering the high humidity. i am located about 2 miles west of the town of charlotte and the deck faces south. as i looked about the sky i noted a reddish object do-south about 30-45 degrees above the horizon and approximately 12-15 miles away which i initially suspected was a star or planet, though on closer inspection this object was in motion.It was definitely headed do-north toward me though it sort of "bounced", right,left,up,down and when it had covered maybe half of that 12-15 mile distance it turned sharply to the east and i lost sight of it in the trees surrounding my yard and i was not able to catch sight of it again.
 i kind of stood there for a second digesting what i had just seen and remarked to the dog,"i think we just saw a ufo". i was not fearful but maybe a bit anxious as i hurried bob and myself back into the house where i tried,unsuccessfully to go back to bed and sleep.
content.summary: I saw what i believe was a ufo early this a.M.

content.detailedDescription:
Absolutely beautiful , about 25-35 deg. to street level , very close estimating about 20 blocks away because of it's size , but most likely further than that , wwe & stationary for 12 min. while watching than went home . returned 6 min. later to see if it was still there & it was took another photo , by this time it was dark outdoors . teenagers were passing by me & looked at what i was looking at smiling & taking photos , & hear them , wow so bright is it a star , than another person said no it's low , than maybe a plane or something than the boy said no it's just there sitting not moving , ah maybe it's ufo , i did not say anything to them & kept on looking at this beautiful radiating "object" as i did not want to loose sight of it , i was enveloped in peaceful awe . once the photos were on eye photo i was somewhat disappointed as although the colors were as on the 'object' it didn't even resemble the shape but rather it seems as if kept on shapes which i haven't seen at all nor those kids . later i was showing it , on the computer, to an aquaintance & he said it still looked amazing . 
enclosing 3 zoomed in images .
content.shape: Circle,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Spectacular radiating spectrum ray-lights , very near & low.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the front yard and lokking at the fireworks coming from across the river. i turned to go inside and i just glanced at a light coming from the sky. i was like wow, and turned aroud. there was a ball that looked most like a fireball. it was moving realy fast across the sky from se to nw. it slowed down so fast it was like an instant stop. but before it stoped it had three lines behind it. they disappeared one by one. after all of them were gone a little little one appeared out of nowhere. a realy bright long gray light hit the tip of the moutains. the little one just stayed there. lastly the big one shot of so fast i almost didn't see it. then the little one zig-zag across the sky following the bigger one. and all of it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo sightings on july 4th.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside a friends house in the country; about to smoke a cigarette and staring at the stars (not looking for a u.F.O. or anything like that). as i watched to the west i noticed a strangely bright white light to the west; that i first thought was simply the i.S.S. ; i then noticed a plane to the south that appeared to be flying west, and that is also when i noticed the red blinking lights that are common to see. i looked towards the other light in the west and noticed it wasn't blinking, and thought, "well maybe its a helicopter or something" . i realized i could hear the plane to the south making noise but not this. it flew in a pretty much straight line from west to east, only swaying slightly from either optical illusion or from winds pushing against it. it also seemed to fly around the speed that i have seen other planes and aircraft fly at, (quicker than a car, but nothing overly fast. the especially and pretty much only really weird or strange thing that seemed to happen was after it went passed me to the east the intense brightly lit object, seemed to have faded like somebody turned down a light that is hooked to a dimmer switch. the light faded down slowly until the only thing left of the view was the tiniest little pin prick off red in the sky. so for all technical purposes this fit the definition of a u.F.O. as i cant identify it. it was flying, and i presume it is some sorta object. but in my heart i believe it was a man made craft and i'm just curious as to what it is i saw earlier tonight. so again quick summary; 1. object emitting bright white light came from west heading east. 2. while flying passed i didn't notice any other lights including the common blinking lights. 3. after passing me and continuing east for a couple seconds, the bright white light faded out and possibly faded into a solitary pinpoint of red light. 4.The entire time it seemed to travel in a straight path, (until the light faded) after which i couldn't find it anymore. 5.As i said in the beginning, my purpose of being outside was to smoke a cigarette and check out the stars, and it was a perfectly clear night. 6. being in the country, i gad a very clear unlit view of the sky. really curious as to what this is. thank you.
content.summary: Bright white light  from west suddenly faded in east.

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting into the car, coming out of the grocery store. i looked out the front window on the passenger side and noticed a beautiful cloud with sunlight illuminating from behind it. instantly i took my phone out and got a quick snapshot just as the car started to back out of the parking space. i always take pictures of the clouds an skies as it is a beauty to me, but it wasnt until last night i looked back at that picture and randomly zoomed in on two sections of it. once at the top right corner of the photo where there appears to be a faint cylinder shaped object, and another in the upper left center area of the photo where i noticed a spherecal object. not once did i notice these objects when taking the picture. i wondered if i had caught some unidentified object or objects on my picture. immediately i zoomed around the entire photo looking for birds in which i could compare the objects to. finding what looks to be birds in the lower left central area of the photo, i analysed and compared an honestly i cant tell. i don't know how far up the objects are, if they are moving or if there was any sound. unfortunately the software on my laptop wont allow me to sharpen it enough to make out exactly what the objects could be. and im certainly no photo analyst to begin with. not for sure what this could be or if its anything unusual at all, but if so i hope it will help out on the search for evidence of extraterrestrial life.
content.summary: I noticed something odd in a photo i had taken.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my old residence where i grew up in city terrace a small suburb just east of los angeles and north west of monterey park ca. a friend of mine (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) asked me if i had noticed the object? i asked what he was talking about and he pointed out the object to me which at first looked to be a mylar baloon?? but did not move from its position at all nor get smaller as when a baloon does as it goes up and away gettting smaller and smaller until gone. this shiny object (could not make out shape)was just staying in the same place for at least 5 mins until it moved toward the north west in a diagnol motion? not like a plane more like a video game??
i thought maybe a satelite? out of position? but all satelites move in mostly the same pattern. this did not. once again the object moved in an awkward manner. moved back to its original spot in the sky but in a round about way. not taking a direct path but making straight turns horizontally and vertically?? i only wish i had a good camera!!! i asked another friend that was there and she to confirmed what we were seeing was indeed there. there was about 6 of us there. we even called nbc to report it. but no luck. they did not hear of anything. this went on for at least 45mins??? then it just disappeared?? then around 10 mins later my friend (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) the person who showed us the object in the first place was on the other side of the 10 fwy and saw it again headed toward down town la. i told him that i was going to report it. so there it is.
content.summary: Very shiny object roughly 50,000 ft. randomly moving around no specific flight plan??
